name: Android Gallery Thumbnail Index
summary: A THUMBDATA4--1967290299 file is a data file created by the Gallery app included with select Android phones, such as Sony Xperia and Samsung J7. It contains information about every thumbnail image Gallery has indexed, to help the app load the images more quickly. THUMBDATA4--1967290299 is stored in a device's hidden .THUMBNAILS folder, which is visible only when you've chosen to show hidden files and folders on your device.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.
